title: How can heat sensors detect heat from a distance? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the type of sensor. Some ‘heat sensors’ basically measure the local temperature, so they can’t tell you much about the heat at a distance. But others, like infrared sensors, can detect the amount of IR radiation being emitted from a certain direction, which allows you to figure out how hot something is at a distance.
